title: CR69006: Cryogenic Heat Transfer Laboratory - Quick Facts
text:
CR69006
Course name | CRYOGENIC HEAT TRANSFER LABORATORY
Offered by | Cryogenic Engineering
Credits | 2
L-T-P | 0-0-3
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequsites: None Thermal conductivity of insulating powder, Heat transfer in forced convection, Heat transfer in natural convection, Heat transfer from a pin fin apparatus, Emissivity measurement apparatus, Cross flow heat exchanger, Parallel flow counter flow heat exchanger, Two phase heat transfer unit, Critical heat flux apparatus, Studies on vacuum insulation through boil off loss measurement of liquid nitrogen, Temperature measurement unit, Experimental reaction turbine
